text_problem: Device shows error i59; output out7 is on; relay rel7 switched; Vdd at 23.8V.

solution.steps: Inspect rack-III MGS43 magnetic switch; reseat cable; replace if continuity fails.

text_problem: Error p03; output out2 off; relay not switched; Vdd at 19.7V.

solution.steps: Check PSU; ensure Vdd >= 24V; replace PSU if droop persists.
